member.name: T:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationMicrosoftTeamsExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods on .

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationMicrosoftTeamsExtensions.MicrosoftTeams(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.IFormatProvider,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.String)
member.summary:
extension that provides configuration chaining.
new LoggerConfiguration() .MinimumLevel.Verbose() .WriteTo.MicrosoftTeams("webHookUri") .CreateLogger();
member.param: Instance of object.
The incoming web hook URI to the Microsoft Teams channel.
The title of messages.
The maximum number of events to post in a single batch; defaults to 1 if not provided i.e. no batching by default.
The time to wait between checking for event batches; defaults to 1 sec if not provided.
The format provider used for formatting the message.
value that specifies minimum logging level that will be allowed to be logged.
The proxy address to use.
